original_title: A Cor do Fogo e a Cor da Cinza
overview: Wagner lives in the favela and since the age of 7 has owned Rede Metror, a television channel made of paper and crayons. After 11 years and more than 70 soap operas broadcast, Wagner is directing real actresses for the first time.
title: A Cor do Fogo e a Cor da Cinza
